question: A carpenter works for 3 weeks every month and for 6 days every week. If he gets paid $125 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The carpenter works for 6 days every week and works for 3 weeks every month so he works for 6 days/week * 3 weeks/month = <<6*3=18>>18 days/month
If he earns $125 every day he then earns $125/day * 18 days/month = $<<125*18=2250>>2250/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns $2250/month * 12 months/year = $<<2250*12=27,000>>27,000
#### 27,000
